::Wolveritron/Eclipse/Ramus::

    "I fight you now, bubb" Wolveritron said=
. "Because you ticked me off."
    Eclipse transformed to his full out batt=
le mode, standing at nine feet tall. His claws extended to their full lengt=
h, 5 inches. His teeth were gleaming, they were ready to have mech fluid on=
 them.
    Ramus pulled his crossbow up and aimed it at Razor Claw.
    "We=
're ready for ya," They said. They would not make the first move, though.
 =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com 
  Sent: Sunday, February 11, 2001 9:38 AM
  Subject: Re: Dachande res=
pond or else


  Razor Claw rolled out the busted windshield using the tuck=
 and roll technique to avoid excessive damage. 

  "You decide to fight aft=
er all I see." the raptor yells in his rage. he charges forward biting at W=
olveritron. "You fight me now, after leaving your team to fight alone? I wi=
ll kill you slowly."


    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: dachande=
 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, February 10, 2001 7:4=
7 AM
    Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


    He is.

    ::Wolverit=
ron/Eclipse/Ramus::

        His claws dropped from his hands. "Who said I'=
m lettin others fight for me, Bub?"
        "Wolveritron, this is what he w=
ants," Eclipse said, putting his hand out, holding Wolveritron back. "Don't=
 give it to him."
        "Don't tell me who I can fight," Wolveritron said=
.
        Ramus pulled his energy crossbow out (He's a twin of Ramulus). "I=
 have no problem giving him what he wants."
        He didn't fire though.
=
